example.eg: You should be a writer, you make up such interesting stories.
example.egtrans: 你真该去当个作家，你能编造出如此有趣的故事。

example.eg: The Red Cross made up emergency kits for the earthquake victims.
example.egtrans: 红十字协会为救援地震受灾群众将急救药包组装到一起。

example.eg: The cast was made up of amateurs.
example.egtrans: 演员阵容是由业余选手构成的。

example.eg: We had an argument, but later we kissed and made up.
example.egtrans: 我们吵了架，不过之后我们亲吻彼此并重归于好。

example.eg: I haven't made up with Alex yet after yesterday's fight.
example.egtrans: 昨天吵架之后，我还没有和艾利克斯和好。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与…和好, 与…重归于好

example.eg: She carries every kind of makeup in her handbag.
example.egtrans: 她的手袋里装满了各种化妆品。

example.eg: The makeup of the committee should reflect its membership.
example.egtrans: 委员会的组成应该反映其成员结构。

example.eg: She made up for being rude to me yesterday by inviting me out for coffee.
He'll never be able to make up for his lack of natural ability.
That guy makes me sick; he's always making up to the boss.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 巴结, 讨好, 奉承

example.eg: The pair kissed and made up after a nine-year feud.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 和好, 言归于好, 弥补失去的时间

example.eg: Are you coming with me or not?  Make up your mind!
example.egtrans: 你到底跟不跟我来？快决定！
